meanings.definition: To hear (speech or a speaker) without the speaker's knowledge.
meanings.sent1: I overheard my sister talking on the phone secretly.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, I overheard a conversation while walking in the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat overheard the mice planning a surprise party for her.
meanings.sent4: The walls of the old house seemed to overheard the whispers of its past inhabitants.
meanings.sent5: The wind carried the overheard secrets far and wide.
